Cell.Data: To confirm/ ensure that cmp_instr is being covered
Check if Imem_en is being covered
To ensure that any random PC is covered
Check that the ADD and AND instruction work in both modes
To check if the ALU opcode is being covered
To check if destination register is being covered
To check if first source register is being covered
To check if second source register is being covered
To check if imm5 bit is being covered
To check if NOT operation and SR1 register is being used
To check if mem opcode is being covered
To check if destination memory register is being covered
To check if source memory register is being covered
To check if base register is being covered
To check if PC Offset6 is being covered
To check if PC Offset9 field is being covered
To check if LD uses valid dr
To check if LD uses valid pcoffset9
To check if LDR uses valid dr
To check if LDR uses valid BaseR
To check if LDR uses valid pcoffset6
To check if LDI uses valid dr
To check if LDI uses valid pcoffset9
To check if STR uses the correct sr
To check if STR uses correct baser
To check if STR uses the correct pcoffset6
To check if STI uses the correct sr
To check if STI uses the correct pcoffset9
To check if ST uses the correct sr
To check if ST uses the correct pcoffset9
To check if LEA uses the correct dr
To check if LEA uses the correct pcoffset9
To check if opcode is being covered
To check if NZP is being covered
To check if PC is being covered
To check if base is being covered
To check if Jump instructions have all valid combinations of BaseR
To check if BR instructions have all valid combinations of NZP including: 011, 001, 101, 010
To check if BR instructions have all valid pcoffset9
Test with different kind of Arithmetric instructions
Test with different kind of Memory instructions
Test with different kind of Control instructions(Branch, Jump)
Test with all possible ALU, MEM, and CTRL instructions
"Ensure that all design units have 100% statement coverage 100% branch coverage"
